meanings.definition: A collection of charters or deeds.
meanings.sent1: The cartularies in the library contain ancient documents.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours studying the cartularies to learn about the history of the town.
meanings.sent3: The cartularies were so old, they seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent4: His cartularies were like a treasure chest of forgotten stories.
meanings.sent5: The cartularies were carefully preserved to ensure their historical value.

meanings.definition: A register or record of charters or deeds.
meanings.sent1: The cartularies listed all the important land transactions.
meanings.sent2: The historian consulted the cartularies to trace the ownership of the estate.
meanings.sent3: The cartularies were so detailed, they could almost tell a story on their own.
meanings.sent4: Her cartularies were like a roadmap through history.
meanings.sent5: The cartularies provided a glimpse into the legal affairs of the past.
